page.title: 18Aerobics in Colwall
page.content: "Why don't you start a class in Colwall - I'd come!" Thus, since April 1984, Monday nights have seen Colwall ladies donning leotards and tights, and the Park Hotel reverberating to the sounds of 'Disco' music. The motivation for joining the class varies. Some wish to lose weight, others to keep fit, for some the post work-out drink and chat at the bar at the hotel is reward enough. The faithful (some might call them the mad) turn out in all weathers to "fight the flab" in the really health-conscious Eighties, and all are united in the opinion that even when feeling dull and listless after a gruelling hour of jog, sweat and stretch, they feel thoroughly refreshed and full of vitality.
